name: Mirana
title: Princess of the Moon
lore: Mirana is the chosen servant of Selemene, goddess of the moon. She rides her tiger mount into battle.

starstorm.name: Starstorm
starstorm.description: Calls down stars that damage nearby enemies. A second star hits the closest enemy.

sacredArrow.name: Sacred Arrow
sacredArrow.description: Fires a long-range arrow that stuns and damages. Stun duration increases with distance.

leap.name: Leap
leap.description: Mirana and her tiger leap forward, granting bonus attack and movement speed.

moonlightShadow.name: Moonlight Shadow
moonlightShadow.description: Makes all allied heroes invisible. Attacking breaks invisibility briefly.
